article_title: Whole Foods: Shoppers Can 'Vote With Their Dollars' On Pro-Life Eden Foods

article_metadata.author: Clare O'Connor

og.description: Eden Foods is on the receiving end of backlash thanks to its CEO's decision to fight Obamacare's contraceptive mandate, with regional grocery co-ops and individual petitioners deciding to look elsewhere for their soy milk.
og.title: Whole Foods: Shoppers Can 'Vote With Their Dollars' On Pro-Life Eden Foods
